Name: TA 1302 Rate limit edit page UI tests

Tests.Name: Create a rate limit from the list page

Steps.Name: User can create a rate limit with default values
User can create a rate limit with text name
User can create a rate limit with long name
User can create a rate limit with special chars name
User can create a rate limit with trimmed name
User can check trimmedname
User can not create a rate limit with empty name

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is too short

Failed validating 'minLength' in schema['properties']['name']:
    {'description': 'Name of entity shown in UI',
     'minLength': 1,
     'title': 'Name',
     'type': 'string'}

On instance['name']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: User can not create a rate limit with the same name

Expected.Text: b'409 Conflict: entry with name testname already exists in document [ratelimits]'

Steps.Name: User can create rate limit with one rate limit
User cannot delete Count by keys when we have only one
User can add more than one Count by keys
Check that count by `header` can not be empty
Check that count by `cookie` can not be empty
Check that count by `argument` can not be empty
User can not add same key twice
User can create a rate limit`s timeframe with positive number
User can not create a rate limit`s timeframe with '0' number
User can not create a rate limit`s timeframe with text value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'text' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['timeframe']:
    {'description': 'The time in which to limit the requests according to '
                    'the threshold',
     'title': 'Time To Limit',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['timeframe']:
    'text'"

Steps.Name: User can not create a rate limit`s timeframe with negative number
User can not create a rate limit`s timeframe with decimal number

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
1.25 is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['timeframe']:
    {'description': 'The time in which to limit the requests according to '
                    'the threshold',
     'title': 'Time To Limit',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['timeframe']:
    1.25"

Steps.Name: User can not create a rate limit`s timeframe with empty value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['timeframe']:
    {'description': 'The time in which to limit the requests according to '
                    'the threshold',
     'title': 'Time To Limit',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['timeframe']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: User can create a rate limit
User can check action types
User can create a ban with '0' value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
0 is less than the minimum of 1

Failed validating 'minimum' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    0"

Steps.Name: User can create a ban with '1' value

Expected.Text: b'ttl can only be a multiple of 60'

Steps.Name: User can create a ban with '1440' value
User can create a ban with '1441' value

Expected.Text: b'ttl can only be a multiple of 60'

Steps.Name: User can create a ban with empty value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: User can create a ban with negative value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
-1 is less than the minimum of 1

Failed validating 'minimum' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    -1"

Steps.Name: User can create a ban with decimal value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
1.22 is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    1.22"

User can create a rate limit with one exclude

User can add several tags to exclude
User can`t add same tag to include
User can`t add same tag to exclude
User can`t add one tag to exclude and include
User can't add tag less then 3 chars to include
User can't add tag less then 3 chars to exclude
User can create a rate limit`s events validations with '0' number
User can create a rate limit`s events validations with '15' number

'text' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['threshold']:

     'title': 'Threshold',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['threshold']:
